snippet: The offer for the maker of mobile security software is the latest attempt by a Chinese company listed in the United States to go private,
abstract: DealBook Online; Qihoo 360 Technology Company reports that a consortium led by chief executive Zhou Hongyi has made an offer to buy company for $10 billion.
lead_paragraph: The offer for the maker of mobile security software is the latest attempt by a Chinese company listed in the United States to go private,

headline.main: Qihoo 360 of China Announces C.E.O.-Led Takeover Bid
